content.text:
# 2025 Howard Bison football team

The 2025 Howard Bison football team represents Howard University as a member of the Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference (MEAC) during the 2025 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Bison are led by sixth-year head coach Larry Scott, and plays home games at William H. Greene Stadium in Washington, D.C.
Schedule
